Name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
Title: Xinyan: Rockin' in a Flaming World
Source: Reward for inviting Xinyan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1312]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1312] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S13121]</color>.
When $[A1312], who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: If you have no more than 1 card in your Hand, deal +2 DMG. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1312] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.
